## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description         | Type                                              | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | Fixed color         | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
| `dark`   | `dark`    | Color in dark mode  | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
| `light`  | `light`   | Color in light mode | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
